Limits are non-existent in the metaverse
The seminar “Limits are non-existent in the metaverse" is an opportunity to disseminate knowledge to the ingenious young generation about creativity in Metaverse. It is part of a series to strengthen cooperation between Van Lang University, Citiverse, and the architectural design communities. It will also open up many career opportunities for design and architecture students when meeting KOLs, approaching new technologies, and updating new creative ways in this industry.
Trinh Cong Son Hall
Van Lang University Campus 3
3rd August, 2022
1:30pm - 4:30pm
Come & join us
Gate 1
69/68 Dang Thuy Tram. Ward 13,
Binh Thanh District, HCM City
Gate 2
80/86 Duong Quang Ham, Ward 5,
Go Vap District, HCM City
Guest speakers
They are highly experienced leaders in the industry
Freddie Nguyen
Founder and CEO of Citiverse
Chris Bosse
Co-founder and CEO of LAVA
Ngo Hoang Kha
Co-founder and Head Designer of KHAAR
Welcome to Citiverse
Citiverse is a striking 3D city simulated metaverse developed as a co-creation platform that allows everyone to create their dream living space in exciting City Building gameplay, enjoy free time with Citiverse games, as well as immerse in spectacular 3D/VR experiences with friends.
